credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Wall Elevation of a Bedroom Alcove
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor, white gouache, over graphite
description: White-toned walls with blue accents. A day bed is arranged in an alcove, under draped canopy, against a bouquet of flowers, lyre, and a water bird painted on the back wall.
name: Drawing
